title: Manage Asana projects with natural language AI assistant via chat & webhook
description:
ðŸ¤– Asana AI Assistant: Project Management via Natural Language

Transform chat conversations into Asana actions - This workflow creates an AI agent that lets users manage Asana through conversational commands instead of manual clicks.

Key Use Cases:
âœ… Accelerated Project Creation
â†’ "Create 'Q3 Campaign' project in Marketing workspace with Design team"
â†’ Generates projects with correct teams/workspaces in 1 request

âœ… Dynamic Task Management
â†’ *"Add 'Finalize assets' subtask to TSK-123"*
â†’ "Update 'Blog Post' due date to Friday"
â†’ Modifies tasks/subtasks without searching

âœ… Automated Reporting
â†’ "Show open tasks in Product Launch"
â†’ "List last 5 projects in Design workspace"
â†’ Pulls live data via conversational queries

âœ… Collaboration Boost
â†’ *"Add comment to TSK-456: Client approved visuals"*
â†’ Posts context-rich updates while multitasking

Ideal For:

    Managers creating projects during calls

    Teams updating tasks via Slack/chat

    PMs generating quick status reports

    Reducing Asana onboarding friction
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
